info.name: RestroVibe API Collection
info.description: Complete API collection for RestroVibe Restaurant Management System SaaS

request.description: Get admin dashboard overview with statistics
Get tenant statistics for admin dashboard
Get revenue analytics for admin dashboard
Get all tenants with pagination and filters
Create a new tenant with owner user
Switch admin context to specific tenant
Get all restaurants for current tenant
